name: Mario
star_ability: Roll the numbered die. Collect that many Coins +5 from the Bank.

name: Princess Peach
star_ability: Collect rent from the Bank for each Property you own.
power_up_ability: Choose any player to drop 4 Coins.

name: Yoshi
star_ability: Collect all Coins on the board.
power_up_ability: Choose the next player in front of or behind you to drop 3 Coins.

name: Bowser
star_ability: Collect 5 Coins from the Bank for each Boss you've defeated
power_up_ability: After you steal 2 Coins from a player, steal 1 Coin from all players.

name: Rosalina
star_ability: You may drop 5 Coins to steal another player's least expensive Property.
power_up_ability: You may collect rent from the Bank for any one of your Properties.

name: Boo
star_ability: You may drop 3 Coins to use the Super Star Ability of any other Character on the board.
power_up_ability: All other players drop 1 Coin. You may advance to the space diretly behind the next player on the board. Follow the rules of that space.

name: Toad
star_ability: Collect 5 Coins. Roll the numbered die, and move again.
power_up_ability: After players drop 1 Coin, roll the numbered die, and move again.

name: Luigi
star_ability: All other player skip their next Power-up Die roll.
power_up_ability: Choose any player to drop 3 Coins. That player skips their next Power-up Die roll.

name: Tanooki Mario
star_ability: Advance to the next unowned Property. You may buy it. If there are no unowned Properties, do nothing.
power_up_ability: If there is a player on the space in front of you, they drop 6 Coins.

name: Fire Mario
star_ability: The next two players on the board each drop 4 Coins.
power_up_ability: If the next player on the board is four or more spaces ahead of you, they drop 5 Coins.

name: Wario
star_ability: You may drop up to 8 Coins then move forward that many spaces.
power_up_ability: You may steal 5 Coins from another player if you are both on the same space.

name: Diddy Kong
star_ability: Move up to three spaces forward or backward.
power_up_ability: You may steal 4 Coins from a player who is up to five spaces behind you.
